about_the_game:
Discover the unforgettable Hero World Starter Kit DLC and embark on the perfect start to this captivating adventure! Immerse yourself in a world full of heroes and secure a variety of content that will make your beginning in Hero World even more exciting.

With this DLC, you will not only receive 500 shiny coins but also 200 keys that you can use in the Story Mode shop to replenish your lives and elixirs. Keep an eye on your lives and use your coins wisely to ensure you have the necessary respawns and be ready to face new challenges at any time.

Additionally, 5 healing elixirs await you, helping you replenish your health and restore your energy. Utilize these powerful potions to recover from devastating battles and enter the next stage of your epic hero's journey stronger than ever.

What are you waiting for? Seize the opportunity and secure the Hero World Starter Kit DLC. Dive into the captivating world of Hero World and continue your heroic deeds. With the valuable coins, keys, and elixirs at your disposal, all possibilities are open to shape your adventure and rise as the true hero. Step in and show the world what you're capable of!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit

short_description: Experience the story of Hero World in a whole new way with the Starter Kit DLC. This expansion pack includes 500 coins, 200 keys, and 5 elixirs to make your start in Hero World easier.
